Blog.post: todae is a special dae...hehezx...tat is father's dae n my grandmother birthdae...we went to eat seafood...togather wif my father side of the family n my cousin...we had so much fun todae...we hav laughter n fun...i had becum a auntie so young...hehezx...as my cousin had given birth to a baby boy n ger...the baby boy is onli 1 yrs old while the ger is 3 yrs old...every year,we will hav to gather around to eat in the resturant 4 my grandmother n grandfather birthdae...we had juz eaten my grendmother....next month will b my grandfather...looking forward to tis daes...byezx...signing off...

So tired out todae...becuz of the netball training we hav todae...mi had fallen down on the road n sprain my ankle n my palm the skin had tear out...so disgusting...we will b having a friendly match wif bedok north sec sch...hope we can win them...our coach sae we hav the potential in our team...lolzx...sch is reopening so soon...i hav to rush my hw le...didnt eben do anithing at all....hehehzx...hav to work hard le...take care everybody n hav fun during tis last few holidae...byezxbyezx...muackzx=PpPp

hizhiz everyone...tis is my 3rd times writing 4 u all...hehezx...so sianzx...haizx.. tml hav to go 4 netball...9-11am so early...hav to wake up at 7.30 to prepare...mi havent do my hw yet...hehezx...passing my book to let people do...lolzx...dun realli wan to do my hw...haizx...!!!well guess tat i realli hav to rush all my hw last min again...hehezx...nth happen todae...well i g2g le...take care n muackzx to u all=PpPp...i will keep on updating my blog...hope u all wun find it ugly as i also felt tat it is so ugly...wahahahzx...

~~yoyozx~~hizhiz everybody!!!nth muchie happened todae....feeling so tired rite now...so exhuasted by todae netball's training...but is a fun time...lolzx...mi finally do 1 hw finish le...so happi...(flying around like an angel)lolzx...haizx...holidae finishing le...hav to be more hardworking le...hehezx...signing off le...bbl..take care...

~~hellow~~todae mi hav a great fun...lolzx...take so mani ne0-print in 1 whole short..hehezx...so fun...hoping to find a person to scan the neo-print 4 mi...hehezx...the pic we take got funni one got cute cute 1 got pretty 1...hehezx...so fun todae...haizx...finding ppl to help mi scan the pic...hehezx...gtg le...bb...take care...

hizhiz..first need to thanx [C]yNdA alot...he help mi to design my blog too...thanx alot to u...kekezx...Start 4 mi todae journal...todae arhx...online 4 so long le....hehezx...bz abt mi blog n fren blog too!!!haizx...sch reopen soon le...lolzx...havent do hw yet...lolzx...need to chiong 4 hw le...wahahahahzx...hope tat i can copy...hehezx...staring at the com since in the morning till now...mi sure degree go up wan...hehezx...sch reopen first dae not need bring bks...hehezx....bag so light....also going back to my pri sch to c the new sch...meet my fren le at there...gtg n chiong 4 hw le...bbl...take care n love ya...n realli a big thank u to u!!![C]yNdA!!!kekezx...

hahzx...todae hor...didnt do hw finish going to use 1 favorite trick!!!COPY!!!lolzx...we in the evening,i n jane went to ep(east point) to go arcade,take neo-print n walk pasamalan...we went to the huanted hse there...cuz her mum fren got the enough amount to go in...we went in...we were all so scared abt it...mi n jane scream so loud...i wanted to cry too...i was too scared...lolzx...but it is fun...hehezx...g2g le bbl.....sianzx...tml need to go sch le..bb

haizx...xianzx...todae in sch..like going to hell...all teacher change liao...haizx...i wan to hav my science teacher back!!!i miss him...lolzx...tml lesson so mani...hav the face the teacher 2 periods each...sianzx...tml also got netball...2.30-5.30pm...3 hrs...in a hot dazing sun...lolzx...hope tml will b a fine n peaceful dae...hehezx...g2g le..bbl...

haizx...another exhuasted dae in sch...ytd got black out...but mi didnt kana infected cuz i still int he air-con room doing my hw...wahahahazx...todae in sch damn sucky...all my teacher sux...y they give us the teacher all like tat wan...i buay tahan them...haizx...so exhuasted by ytd netball traning...wanred to sleep in klass wan...but dun feel like...later kana scolding...i go revenge my fren who make mi...then got 1 guy make my neck...now veri pain...lolzx...gtg le...bbl...

haizx...juz give my parent scold mi...wawawawa!!!so sad!!!haizx...no mood le...mi oso veri tired...after the netball training le...everywhere pain...pain,tired,sad,angry n sleepy...ZzZZzzz...haizx...so sad...but muz look at the bright side of the dae...hehezx...heppi n sadness is alwae around...lolzx...g2g le...juz came here to sae i sad onli...lolzx...bbl...

hiyo...so sianzx..then i cum n rite wan...the peson online all nth to tok wan...wake up at around 9.45am,then went to do my hsework...then at 11.40 i went to prepare clothes n the thing i needed to bring out...then i went to bath...at aroung 12 i cum out...then call jane ok le mahx...then we go out le...we go n walk wif wilson(my pri-fren)around century n tampines...walk ar walk all the same place wan...walk till sianzx le...then at around 3.15 we went to meet fren to watch movie...we went to watch around the world in 80 dae...quite nice...hehezx...frm 3.25-5.30pm...2 hrs like tat...then we go out we walk 4 a while n go eat...then the dae is over le...then cum back..mi bath le then online till now...hehezx...g2g...bb n take care..

Ooo.hizhiz.ooO...so sianzx...todae morning wake up at around 7.30 am bahx...lolzx...so early...we meet celine at tampines small mac...mi n bonnie so early reach there then wait 4 pei fang n celine...the others all last min sae dun wan cum...mei mei(mei yan)most cute...organize the jogging then sae leg pain cannot go...lolzx...celine sae we suppose to run 6 rounds then in the end,mi,bonnie,bernice n celine run 2 but pei fang run 1 onli...lolzx...then we went to play true or dare...almost everytime i turn all kana mi...make mi so scared...lolzx...they force mi to sae things,lucky i didnt choose dare...if not i mati liao...lolzx...then later we play true or dare le hor...we go play soccer...bonnie's ball...lolzx...then later after a while we wentr back to play true or dare...then we went to eat lunch....hehezx...we went to mac to eat...we tok at there 4 so long...we order the thing so mani tat we oso cannot eat finish...hehezx....then later we went to walk 4 a while then we go home...hav quite a happi dae...reach home le...then i go online n watch tv...now time check 8.50 le...hehezx...g2g le...i rite so long le....bbl...hands need to rest...take care...

hiya!long time didnt go n post le...hahax...todae got cross-country run...mi n gloria they all juz in time went to the reservoir...hahax...the run is veri long n tiring...hahax....but we hav a fun dae...we manage to get top 20....hahax....alot of netball girls get trophy too...after the run we went to eat burger-king...we stay at there 4 abt 1 hr...then we went back to the reservoir to meet our netball coach n cheer 4 the upper sec netball girls...celine n song de r prefect match...they both all get first...hahax...4 upper sec...alot of netball girls get in top 20 too...they r all veri pro...hehex...after tat....our coach went to treat us eat things...we hav a fun n happi dae...i reach home at 1.45pm...hahax...at tat time i m already exhuasted...lolzx...my hand suan le...think i dun rite liao....hahax...
